title: assembly-option-input-values
markdownDescription: ![https://img.shields.io/badge/-Mandatory-red](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Mandatory-red) Displays a checkbox or a dropdown list field so users can choose the desired attachment for their products.

optionsDisplay.description: Define whether the attachment's pre-defined options will be displayed to be selected in a Checkbox (`box`) or in a dropdown list (`select`) .
